_metadata.purpose: Blueprint Registry for Layer 0 Baseline Orchestrator
_metadata.notes: Part of the p-pm-tgs-oci-landingzone repository for Tek Systems Global Services.

description: Defines all baseline blueprints registered under Layer 0 orchestrator control.

blueprints.name: Core Landing Zone Blueprint
blueprints.purpose: Establishes shared network, security, and tenancy governance for OCI.

blueprints.name: One-OE Blueprint
blueprints.purpose: Deploys isolated operational environment for single tenant workloads.

blueprints.name: Multi-OE Blueprint
blueprints.purpose: Supports multiple operational environments orchestrated from a single control plane.
